title: X's new 'transparent' location labels for accounts have people questioning everything
description: X (formerly Twitter) rolled out location labels for users, but it has quickly started stirring the pot as users and experts find faults.
content:
What you need to know
  • X (formerly Twitter) brought location labels to account pages, so users can see where others' accounts originate from.
  • However, it was quickly realized that som… [+3943 chars]
